DOC.brief_summary: The genetic polymorphisms of the cytochrome P450 may influence on the metabolism of tamoxifen. The investigators want to - evaluate the frequency or incidence of the genetic polymorphisms of cytochrome P450 subfamilies(CYP2D6, CYP3A4/5 and CYP2C19) in breast cancer patients, and - analyze the association between the genetic polymorphisms of cytochrome P450 subfamilies and clinical outcomes in breast cancer patients treated by adjuvant tamoxifen therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Cytochrome P450 Polymorphisms (CYP2D6, CYP3A4/5 and CYP2C19) in Breast Cancer Patients
